snippet: Saudi Arabia has confirmed six new infections from the potentially fatal MERS virus, the World Health Organization reported Friday.
abstract: Saudi Arabia confirms six new infections from potentially fatal MERS virus, raising the total number of cases worldwide to 136.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has confirmed six new infections from the potentially fatal MERS virus, the World Health Organization reported Friday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: New Infections Raise Virus Cases to 136
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: New Infections Raise Virus Cases to 136
